  mutate(ID = str_replace_all(df_cardio$participant_id, "\\D+", " "))

#Remove the zero in front of every ID
df_cardio$ID <- as.numeric(df_cardio$ID)
df_cardio$ID <- as.factor(df_cardio$ID)

#remove participants with no ID

  drop_na(ID)
